2.name: Regional
2.description: The activity scope is a supranational region

3.name: Multi-national
3.description: The activity scope covers multiple countries, that don't constitute a region

4.name: National
4.description: The activity scope covers one country

5.name: Sub-national: Multi-first-level administrative areas
5.description: The activity scope covers more than one first-level subnational administrative areas (e.g. counties, provinces, states)

6.name: Sub-national: Single first-level administrative area
6.description: The activity scope covers one first-level subnational administrative area (e.g. country, province, state)

7.name: Sub-national: Single second-level administrative area
7.description: The activity scope covers one second-level subnational administrative area (e.g. municipality or district)

8.name: Single location
8.description: The activity scope covers one single location (e.g. town, village, farm)
